metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45684 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: Northern.tech CFEngine Enterprise before 3.21.3 allows SQL Injection. The fixed versions are 3.18.6 and 3.21.3. The earliest affected version is 3.6.0. The issue is in the Mission Portal login page in the CFEngine hub.

criterions.comment: cfengine3 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
